item.title: Daily dog fouling not being picked up, 23rd December
item.description:
Every day there is a new pile of dogs mess that is left in the middle of the pathway. It seems to be first thing in the morning possibly around 7am before other regular responsible dog walkers arrive. It is the same colour, size and consistency so must be the same dog. It is getting trodden in, wheeled through with pushchairs and bicycles. It is absolutely disgusting.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Park Road, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Building waste dumped in courtyard near residential building, 23rd December
item.description:
A large amount of building waste has been dumped in the courtyard next to this residential building. The waste has been there for approximately two- three weeks and more debris continues to be added. It has not been collected or removed. The waste is unsightly and negatively affects the appearance of the shared outdoor area used by residents. With Christmas approaching, this is particularly disappointing for the local community. Please could this be investigated and the waste removed as soon as possible.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Llanover Road, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet
